short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives you the meaning of your Wordle of the day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted the word of the day from Wordle without losing your streak?

Well this is the solution.

This extension gives you the definition of today's word.
